Does anyone have this issue? When going to the launch pad, you find yourself looking down a your rocket, and when you zoom out, you find that view is rotating around the z axis, switching to the tracking station then back fixes this issue, only for it to happen again if you go to the VAB then back to the launch pad.

 

It's kind of annoying!
Camera switches itself to orbital mode, yes, known. Hit V a couple of times to get it back to normal.

Oh-right, that's what it's doing!

Thanks, issue temporarily fixed
